## decodeNormalizedFloatFromRGBA() function

Decodes a float that was encoded into a rgba8unorm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function decodeNormalizedFloatFromRGBA(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, value: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```
